Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the Erie County Water Authority
Summary: Requires the Erie County Water Authority to have skills training and apprenticeship programs; requires the comptroller perform a decennial audit of the Erie County Water Authority's ability to be merged with Erie county.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the Erie County Water Authority
